cab.content: ///,Military Secret. 1-1754V1v From, Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India, I 1 ord March 1921.KgffALi priority A.337. 2/3. Serial No. 234. Parti. Nil.Part 2. Wazirislan. Situation Wana unchanged. On the 26th near hat I ha oneiuy ambushed small party, hilling three and wounding one. On 1st March near Shahur enemy attacked party, killing eight and wounding three. Above given to Press.
